info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.  You can find out more about     Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).      For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization     filters.
info.title: DSL Metis API

get.summary: Get institute stats with institute id
get.description: Returns institute details corresponding to parameters

parameters.name: institute_id
parameters.description: institute_id for which response desired

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: from which date data needs to be captured

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: till what date data needs to be captured

get.summary: Get institute stats with institute id
get.description: Returns institute details corresponding to parameters

parameters.name: institute_id
parameters.description: institute_id for which response desired

parameters.name: sub_org_id
parameters.description: institute_id's sub organization id for which response desired

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: from which date data needs to be captured

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: till what date data needs to be captured

parameters.name: target_year
parameters.description: target_year for institute students of whose data needs to be captured

get.summary: Get institute cohortwise stats for institute id
get.description: Returns similar response as institute but with cohortwise details corresponding to parameters given

parameters.name: institute_id
parameters.description: institute_id for which response desired

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: from which date data needs to be captured

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: till what date data needs to be captured

parameters.name: goal_id
parameters.description: goal id for which data needs to be captured
